name: Oura Ring
description: Smart ring wearable tracking sleep stages, HRV, resting heart rate, body temperature, blood oxygen, and activity. Provides daily readiness and sleep scores. Compact form factor with research-grade accuracy for sleep tracking.
mechanisms: Photoplethysmography (PPG) for heart rate and HRV
Accelerometer for sleep staging and activity

dosage.notes: Gen 3. Best sleep tracker available in wearable form. HRV and temperature trends most valuable for longevity tracking. Pairs with app for insights.

keyFindings: 94.1% agreement with polysomnography for sleep staging
Detected COVID-19 onset 2.75 days before symptoms via temperature deviation
HRV tracking correlates with autonomic nervous system health and recovery
